name: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided - Digital Deluxe Edition
name_original: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Deus Ex: Mankind Divided - Digital Deluxe Edition is an action-RPG game developed by Eidos Montreal. It was originally released in 2016. Square Enix published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Deus Ex: Mankind Divided - Digital Deluxe Edition is available on PlayStation 4, PC and Xbox One.
